images.description: 大師子大孟姜匜(金)春秋
中山王昔壺(金)戰國晚期
廿七年金皿(金)戰國晚期
兆域圖銅版(金)戰國晚期
鑄客為集脰鼎(金)戰國晚期

shuowen: 《說文》：“爲，母猴也，其爲禽好爪，爪，母猴象也；下腹為母猴形。王育曰：‘爪，象形也。’，古文爲，象兩母猴相對形。”

comments.text: 羅振玉《增訂殷虛書契考釋》：“案：（爲）从爪，从象，絕不見母猴之狀，卜辭作手牽象形……意古者役象以助勞，其事或尚在服牛乘馬以前。”

hint: Original form of 為. Pictograph of a hand (又) guiding an elephant (象) to do work (in ancient China elephants were tamed to do work). Based on the meaning "to work; to do".

topWords.gloss: to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)

images.description: 十四年陳侯午敦(金)戰國中期
中山王昔鼎(金)戰國晚期
兆域圖銅版(金)戰國晚期

chars.hint: Pictograph of a hand. The character is based on the original meaning "hand". The current meaning "again" is a phonetic loan.
chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“又，手也，象形。三指者，手之列多略不過三也。”

comments.text: 高鴻縉《中國字例》：“字原象右手形，手本五指，只作三者，古人皆以三表多。後借為又再之又，乃通假右助之右以代之。久而成習，乃加人旁作佑，以還右助之原。”

topWords.gloss: to want to say sth but then hesitate
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)

images.description: 鄂君啟車節(金)戰國中期

chars.shuowen: 《說文》：“象，長鼻牙，南越大獸，三年一乳。象耳牙四足之形。”

topWords.gloss: to want to say sth but then hesitate
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)

definitions: variant of 為|为[wèi], because of
